ErrorCode.name: AcsStartServices
ErrorCode.description: The status of starting the ACS services, optionally with an exception list.

ErrorCode.name: ServiceAlreadyRunning
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested service is running already.
ErrorCode.description: The requested service is running already and therefore cannot be started.

ErrorCode.name: ServiceNotRunning
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested service is not running.
ErrorCode.description: The requested service is not running and therefore cannot be stopped.
